A Thirst for Torture

A dimly lit room, tension rising.  
She’s desperate for suffering.  

Svidrigaïlov: “She’d throw herself out a window!”  

Svidrigaïlov: “Razumihin better watch your sister!”  

Svidrigaïlov: “Why is she so beautiful?”  

---

A garden avenue, a confrontation unfolds.  
Desire and jealousy collide.  

Svidrigaïlov: “Avdotya Romanovna is incredibly chaste!”  

Svidrigaïlov: “I tried to play my part.”  

Svidrigaïlov: “Her wishes? I was pleased to obey.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Svidrigaïlov reflects on Avdotya Romanovna's intense chastity and her desire for suffering, while also expressing his physical attraction to her.
